===Etymology===
Compound of {{m|ja|小||small|tr=ko}} + {{m|ja|袖||sleeve|tr=sode}}. The ''ko'' here refers to the opening of the sleeve, which is smaller than that of the more formal [[kimono]].

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こそで}}

# A smaller [[Japanese]] robe similar to a [[kimono]], worn either under a kimono or on its own.
